trans-unit.source: Build Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps that support custom interactions from pen and stylus devices, including digital ink for natural writing and drawing experiences.
trans-unit.target: Build Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps that support custom interactions from pen and stylus devices, including digital ink for natural writing and drawing experiences.

trans-unit.source: Pen and stylus interactions
trans-unit.target: Pen and stylus interactions

trans-unit.source: Pen and stylus interactions
trans-unit.target: Pen and stylus interactions

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Optimize your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app design for touch input and get basic pen support by default.
trans-unit.target: Optimize your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app design for touch input and get basic pen support by default.

trans-unit.source: The UWP app ink platform, together with a pen device, provides a natural way to create handwritten notes, drawings, and annotations.
trans-unit.target: The UWP app ink platform, together with a pen device, provides a natural way to create handwritten notes, drawings, and annotations.

trans-unit.source: The platform supports capturing ink data from digitizer input, generating ink data, rendering that data as ink strokes on the output device, managing the ink data, and performing handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: The platform supports capturing ink data from digitizer input, generating ink data, rendering that data as ink strokes on the output device, managing the ink data, and performing handwriting recognition.

trans-unit.source: touchpad
trans-unit.target: touchpad

trans-unit.source: Important APIs
trans-unit.target: Important APIs

trans-unit.source: Windows.Devices.Input
trans-unit.target: Windows.Devices.Input

trans-unit.source: Windows.UI.Input.Inking
trans-unit.target: Windows.UI.Input.Inking

trans-unit.source: Windows.UI.Input.Inking.Core
trans-unit.target: Windows.UI.Input.Inking.Core

trans-unit.source: In addition to serving as a [**pointer device**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225633) (similar to mouse and touch), a pen/stylus is typically associated with writing or drawing directly on a screen using digital ink.
trans-unit.target: In addition to serving as a [**pointer device**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225633) (similar to mouse and touch), a pen/stylus is typically associated with writing or drawing directly on a screen using digital ink.

trans-unit.source: The Universal Windows Platform (UWP) ink platform, together with a pen/stylus device, provides a natural way to create digital handwritten notes, drawings, and annotations.
trans-unit.target: The Universal Windows Platform (UWP) ink platform, together with a pen/stylus device, provides a natural way to create digital handwritten notes, drawings, and annotations.

trans-unit.source: The platform supports capturing digitizer input as ink data, generating ink data, managing ink data, rendering ink data as strokes, and converting ink to text through handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: The platform supports capturing digitizer input as ink data, generating ink data, managing ink data, rendering ink data as strokes, and converting ink to text through handwriting recognition.

trans-unit.source: In addition to capturing the basic position and movement of the pen as the user writes or draws, your app can also track and collect the varying amounts of pressure used throughout a stroke.
trans-unit.target: In addition to capturing the basic position and movement of the pen as the user writes or draws, your app can also track and collect the varying amounts of pressure used throughout a stroke.

trans-unit.source: This information, along with settings for pen tip shape, size, and rotation, ink color, and purpose (plain ink, erasing, highlighting, and selecting), enables you to provide user experiences that closely resemble writing or drawing on paper with a pen, pencil, or brush.
trans-unit.target: This information, along with settings for pen tip shape, size, and rotation, ink color, and purpose (plain ink, erasing, highlighting, and selecting), enables you to provide user experiences that closely resemble writing or drawing on paper with a pen, pencil, or brush.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Your app can also support ink input from other pointer-based devices, including touch digitizers and mouse devices.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Your app can also support ink input from other pointer-based devices, including touch digitizers and mouse devices.

trans-unit.source: The ink platform is very flexible.
trans-unit.target: The ink platform is very flexible.

trans-unit.source: It is designed to support various levels of functionality, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: It is designed to support various levels of functionality, depending on your requirements.

trans-unit.source: There are three components to the ink platform:
trans-unit.target: There are three components to the ink platform:

trans-unit.source: [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) - A XAML UI platform control that, by default, receives and displays all input from a pen as either an ink stroke or an erase stroke.
trans-unit.target: [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) - A XAML UI platform control that, by default, receives and displays all input from a pen as either an ink stroke or an erase stroke.

trans-unit.source: [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) - A code-behind object, instantiated along with an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control (exposed through the [**InkCanvas.InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) property).
trans-unit.target: [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) - A code-behind object, instantiated along with an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control (exposed through the [**InkCanvas.InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) property).

trans-unit.source: This object provides all default inking functionality exposed by the **InkCanvas**, along with a comprehensive set of APIs for additional customization and personalization.
trans-unit.target: This object provides all default inking functionality exposed by the **InkCanvas**, along with a comprehensive set of APIs for additional customization and personalization.

trans-unit.source: [**IInkD2DRenderer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt147263) - Enables the rendering of ink strokes onto the designated Direct2D device context of a Universal Windows app, instead of the default [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.
trans-unit.target: [**IInkD2DRenderer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt147263) - Enables the rendering of ink strokes onto the designated Direct2D device context of a Universal Windows app, instead of the default [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.

trans-unit.source: This enables full customization of the inking experience.
trans-unit.target: This enables full customization of the inking experience.

trans-unit.source: Basic inking with InkCanvas
trans-unit.target: Basic inking with InkCanvas

trans-unit.source: For basic inking functionality, just place an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) anywhere on a page.
trans-unit.target: For basic inking functionality, just place an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) anywhere on a page.

trans-unit.source: The [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) supports ink input only from a pen.
trans-unit.target: The [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) supports ink input only from a pen.

trans-unit.source: The input is either rendered as an ink stroke using default settings for color and thickness, or treated as a stroke eraser (when input is from an eraser tip or the pen tip modified with an erase button).
trans-unit.target: The input is either rendered as an ink stroke using default settings for color and thickness, or treated as a stroke eraser (when input is from an eraser tip or the pen tip modified with an erase button).

trans-unit.source: In this example, an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) overlays a background image.
trans-unit.target: In this example, an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) overlays a background image.

trans-unit.source: This series of images shows how pen input is rendered by this [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.
trans-unit.target: This series of images shows how pen input is rendered by this [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.

trans-unit.source: The blank [InkCanvas](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with a background image.
trans-unit.target: The blank [InkCanvas](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with a background image.

trans-unit.source: The [InkCanvas](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: The [InkCanvas](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with ink strokes.

trans-unit.source: The [InkCanvas](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with one stroke erased.
trans-unit.target: The [InkCanvas](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with one stroke erased.

trans-unit.source: Note how erase operates on an entire stroke, not a portion.
trans-unit.target: Note how erase operates on an entire stroke, not a portion.

trans-unit.source: The inking functionality supported by the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control is provided by a code-behind object called the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011).
trans-unit.target: The inking functionality supported by the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control is provided by a code-behind object called the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011).

trans-unit.source: For basic inking, you don't have to concern yourself with the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011).
trans-unit.target: For basic inking, you don't have to concern yourself with the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011).

trans-unit.source: However, to customize and configure inking behavior on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535), you must access its corresponding **InkPresenter** object.
trans-unit.target: However, to customize and configure inking behavior on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535), you must access its corresponding **InkPresenter** object.

trans-unit.source: Basic customization with InkPresenter
trans-unit.target: Basic customization with InkPresenter

trans-unit.source: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) object is instantiated with each [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.
trans-unit.target: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) object is instantiated with each [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.

trans-unit.source: Along with providing all default inking behaviors of its corresponding [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control, the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) provides a comprehensive set of APIs for additional stroke customization.
trans-unit.target: Along with providing all default inking behaviors of its corresponding [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control, the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) provides a comprehensive set of APIs for additional stroke customization.

trans-unit.source: This includes stroke properties, supported input device types, and whether input is processed by the object or passed to the app.
trans-unit.target: This includes stroke properties, supported input device types, and whether input is processed by the object or passed to the app.

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: Note

trans-unit.source: The [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: The [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922011) cannot be instantiated directly.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is accessed through the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) property of the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).
trans-unit.target: Instead, it is accessed through the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) property of the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).

trans-unit.source: Here, we configure the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: Here, we configure the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes.

trans-unit.source: We also set some initial ink stroke attributes used for rendering strokes to the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).
trans-unit.target: We also set some initial ink stroke attributes used for rendering strokes to the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).

trans-unit.source: Ink stroke attributes can be set dynamically to accommodate user preferences or app requirements.
trans-unit.target: Ink stroke attributes can be set dynamically to accommodate user preferences or app requirements.

trans-unit.source: Here, we let a user choose from a list of ink colors.
trans-unit.target: Here, we let a user choose from a list of ink colors.

trans-unit.source: We then handle changes to the selected color and update the ink stroke attributes accordingly.
trans-unit.target: We then handle changes to the selected color and update the ink stroke attributes accordingly.

trans-unit.source: These images shows how pen input is processed and customized by the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).
trans-unit.target: These images shows how pen input is processed and customized by the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).

trans-unit.source: the inkcanvas with default black ink strokes
trans-unit.target: the inkcanvas with default black ink strokes

trans-unit.source: the inkcanvas with user selected red ink strokes
trans-unit.target: the inkcanvas with user selected red ink strokes

trans-unit.source: The [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with default black ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: The [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with default black ink strokes.

trans-unit.source: The [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with user selected red ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: The [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) with user selected red ink strokes.

trans-unit.source: To provide functionality beyond inking and erasing, such as stroke selection, your app must identify specific input for the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to pass through unprocessed for handling by your app.
trans-unit.target: To provide functionality beyond inking and erasing, such as stroke selection, your app must identify specific input for the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to pass through unprocessed for handling by your app.

trans-unit.source: Pass-through input for advanced processing
trans-unit.target: Pass-through input for advanced processing

trans-unit.source: By default, [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) processes all input as either an ink stroke or an erase stroke.
trans-unit.target: By default, [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) processes all input as either an ink stroke or an erase stroke.

trans-unit.source: This includes input modified by a secondary hardware affordance such as a pen barrel button, a right mouse button, or similar.
trans-unit.target: This includes input modified by a secondary hardware affordance such as a pen barrel button, a right mouse button, or similar.

trans-unit.source: When using these secondary affordances, users typically expect some additional functionality or a modified behavior.
trans-unit.target: When using these secondary affordances, users typically expect some additional functionality or a modified behavior.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, you might need to expose basic ink functionality for pens without secondary affordances (functionality not usually associated with the pen tip), other input device types, or additional functionality, or modified behavior, based on a user selection in your app's UI.
trans-unit.target: In some cases, you might need to expose basic ink functionality for pens without secondary affordances (functionality not usually associated with the pen tip), other input device types, or additional functionality, or modified behavior, based on a user selection in your app's UI.

trans-unit.source: To support this, [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) can be configured to leave specific input unprocessed.
trans-unit.target: To support this, [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) can be configured to leave specific input unprocessed.

trans-unit.source: This unprocessed input is then passed through to your app for processing.
trans-unit.target: This unprocessed input is then passed through to your app for processing.

trans-unit.source: The following code example steps through how to enable stroke selection when input is modified with a pen barrel button (or right mouse button).
trans-unit.target: The following code example steps through how to enable stroke selection when input is modified with a pen barrel button (or right mouse button).

trans-unit.source: For this example, we use the MainPage.xaml and MainPage.xaml.cs files to host all code.
trans-unit.target: For this example, we use the MainPage.xaml and MainPage.xaml.cs files to host all code.

trans-unit.source: First, we set up the UI in MainPage.xaml.
trans-unit.target: First, we set up the UI in MainPage.xaml.

trans-unit.source: Here, we add a canvas (below the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535)) to draw the selection stroke.
trans-unit.target: Here, we add a canvas (below the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535)) to draw the selection stroke.

trans-unit.source: Using a separate layer to draw the selection stroke leaves the **InkCanvas** and its content untouched.
trans-unit.target: Using a separate layer to draw the selection stroke leaves the **InkCanvas** and its content untouched.

trans-unit.source: the blank inkcanvas with an underlying selection canvas
trans-unit.target: the blank inkcanvas with an underlying selection canvas

trans-unit.source: In MainPage.xaml.cs, we declare a couple of global variables for keeping references to aspects of the selection UI.
trans-unit.target: In MainPage.xaml.cs, we declare a couple of global variables for keeping references to aspects of the selection UI.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the selection lasso stroke and the bounding rectangle that highlights the selected strokes.
trans-unit.target: Specifically, the selection lasso stroke and the bounding rectangle that highlights the selected strokes.

trans-unit.source: Next, we configure the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes, and set some initial ink stroke attributes used for rendering strokes to the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).
trans-unit.target: Next, we configure the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes, and set some initial ink stroke attributes used for rendering strokes to the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).

trans-unit.source: Most importantly, we use the [**InputProcessingConfiguration**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948764) property of the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to indicate that any modified input should be processed by the app.
trans-unit.target: Most importantly, we use the [**InputProcessingConfiguration**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948764) property of the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) to indicate that any modified input should be processed by the app.

trans-unit.source: Modified input is specified by assigning **InputProcessingConfiguration.RightDragAction** a value of [**InkInputRightDragAction.LeaveUnprocessed**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948760).
trans-unit.target: Modified input is specified by assigning **InputProcessingConfiguration.RightDragAction** a value of [**InkInputRightDragAction.LeaveUnprocessed**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948760).

trans-unit.source: We then assign listeners for the unprocessed [**PointerPressed**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914712), [**PointerMoved**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914711), and [**PointerReleased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914713) events passed through by the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).
trans-unit.target: We then assign listeners for the unprocessed [**PointerPressed**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914712), [**PointerMoved**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914711), and [**PointerReleased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914713) events passed through by the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).

trans-unit.source: All selection functionality is implemented in the handlers for these events.
trans-unit.target: All selection functionality is implemented in the handlers for these events.

trans-unit.source: Finally, we assign listeners for the [**StrokeStarted**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914702) and [**StrokesErased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948767) events of the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).
trans-unit.target: Finally, we assign listeners for the [**StrokeStarted**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914702) and [**StrokesErased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948767) events of the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).

trans-unit.source: We use the handlers for these events to clean up the selection UI if a new stroke is started or an existing stroke is erased.
trans-unit.target: We use the handlers for these events to clean up the selection UI if a new stroke is started or an existing stroke is erased.

trans-unit.source: the inkcanvas with default black ink strokes
trans-unit.target: the inkcanvas with default black ink strokes

trans-unit.source: We then define handlers for the unprocessed [**PointerPressed**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914712), [**PointerMoved**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914711), and [**PointerReleased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914713) events passed through by the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).
trans-unit.target: We then define handlers for the unprocessed [**PointerPressed**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914712), [**PointerMoved**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914711), and [**PointerReleased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914713) events passed through by the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081).

trans-unit.source: All selection functionality is implemented in these handlers, including the lasso stroke and the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: All selection functionality is implemented in these handlers, including the lasso stroke and the bounding rectangle.

trans-unit.source: the selection lasso
trans-unit.target: the selection lasso

trans-unit.source: To conclude the PointerReleased event handler, we clear the selection layer of all content (the lasso stroke) and then draw a single bounding rectangle around the ink strokes encompassed by the lasso area.
trans-unit.target: To conclude the PointerReleased event handler, we clear the selection layer of all content (the lasso stroke) and then draw a single bounding rectangle around the ink strokes encompassed by the lasso area.

trans-unit.source: the selection bounding rect
trans-unit.target: the selection bounding rect

trans-unit.source: Finally, we define handlers for the [**StrokeStarted**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914702) and [**StrokesErased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948767) InkPresenter events.
trans-unit.target: Finally, we define handlers for the [**StrokeStarted**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914702) and [**StrokesErased**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948767) InkPresenter events.

trans-unit.source: These both just call the same cleanup function to clear the current selection whenever a new stroke is detected.
trans-unit.target: These both just call the same cleanup function to clear the current selection whenever a new stroke is detected.

trans-unit.source: Here's the function to remove all selection UI from the selection canvas when a new stroke is started or an existing stroke is erased.
trans-unit.target: Here's the function to remove all selection UI from the selection canvas when a new stroke is started or an existing stroke is erased.

trans-unit.source: Custom ink rendering
trans-unit.target: Custom ink rendering

trans-unit.source: By default, ink input is processed on a low-latency background thread and rendered "wet" as it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: By default, ink input is processed on a low-latency background thread and rendered "wet" as it is drawn.

trans-unit.source: When the stroke is completed (pen or finger lifted, or mouse button released), the stroke is processed on the UI thread and rendered "dry" to the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) layer (above the application content and replacing the wet ink).
trans-unit.target: When the stroke is completed (pen or finger lifted, or mouse button released), the stroke is processed on the UI thread and rendered "dry" to the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) layer (above the application content and replacing the wet ink).

trans-unit.source: The ink platform enables you to override this behavior and completely customize the inking experience by custom drying the ink input.
trans-unit.target: The ink platform enables you to override this behavior and completely customize the inking experience by custom drying the ink input.

trans-unit.source: Custom drying requires an [**IInkD2DRenderer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt147263) object to manage the ink input and render it to the Direct2D device context of your Universal Windows app, instead of the default [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.
trans-unit.target: Custom drying requires an [**IInkD2DRenderer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt147263) object to manage the ink input and render it to the Direct2D device context of your Universal Windows app, instead of the default [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) control.

trans-unit.source: By calling [**ActivateCustomDrying**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922012) (before the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) is loaded), an app creates an [**InkSynchronizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn903979) object to customize how an ink stroke is rendered dry to a [**SurfaceImageSource**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh702041) or [**VirtualSurfaceImageSource**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh702050).
trans-unit.target: By calling [**ActivateCustomDrying**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922012) (before the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) is loaded), an app creates an [**InkSynchronizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn903979) object to customize how an ink stroke is rendered dry to a [**SurfaceImageSource**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh702041) or [**VirtualSurfaceImageSource**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh702050).

trans-unit.source: For example, an ink stroke could be rasterized and integrated into application content instead of as a separate **InkCanvas** layer.
trans-unit.target: For example, an ink stroke could be rasterized and integrated into application content instead of as a separate **InkCanvas** layer.

trans-unit.source: For a full example of this functionality, see the [Complex ink sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=620314) .
trans-unit.target: For a full example of this functionality, see the [Complex ink sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=620314) .
